message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet in the middle of our last two offers, at $11,250?
